attributes.action: ban parking penalties and car clamping from private and public land in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is aimed at banning parking penalties and car clamping from the United Kingdom. Suggested alternatives are points on the driving licenses or use more the technology and human resources available to educate drivers with their parking habits.  Parking fines and car clamping (and its related enormous charges) cause too much grievance to the population at a time when we need to pull together to make this country Great again.
